commandDescription: Updates profile metadata converting values in any sort of spreadsheets, e.g., csv and excel to xml files.
inputFlagDescription: input file to be converted to xml files
outputdirFlagDescription: output directory where metadata are saved
sourceFlagDescription: directory where source files you convert are stored
delimiterFlagDescription: delimiter for the input file. the default value is comma
errorNogenerateResults: No results found for the generate '%s'.
validationEditableOptions: editable must be true or false.
validationReadableOptions: readable must be true or false.
validationAllowCreateOptions: allowCreate must be true or false.
validationAllowDeleteOptions: allowDelete must be true or false.
validationAllowEditOptions: allowEdit must be true or false.
validationAllowReadOptions: allowRead must be true or false.
validationModifyAllRecordsOptions: modifyAllRecords must be true or false.
validationViewAllRecordsOptions: viewAllRecords must be true or false.
validationDefaultOptions: default must be true or false.
validationVisibleOptions: visible must be true or false.
validationEnabledOptions: enabled must be true or false.
validationVisibilityOptions: visibility must be one of the followings:
